name: Homebound Spaceman
description:
Far from home.

Scouting the Great Beyond in search for knowledge!

Your journey has gone as planned....until....

An Attack!!
Pirates!!

You barely escaped the attack.....But at a cost.

Your Intergalactic Jump Engine is now badly damaged, preventing you from going home.

Explore the Great Beyond and find parts to replace your Engine so you can finally go back home.

Good Luck, Spaceman!

This is my first completed study project. I hope you will enjoy playing it as much as I have had creating it.
